Subject: Update StealthAudit to the current version
Description: We need to update StealthAudit to the current version and need support for this
Next_Steps__c: Sent out the instructions, awaiting reply
Solution_Comment__c: On this meeting we checked the settings for your AIC. I've noticed that you have followed the article's default port allocation, which would be 481. However, that did not work, and since you've mentioned that you didn't have to specify the port previously in the address bar, and after checking the existing certificates, there was one for 443. After changing to that port in the AIC's config file and restarting the server, everything worked.
